Summary: Yellow-Orange orb sat stationary for 3 to 4 sec. then shot off 1000mph straight off horizon.
divs: sighting detailsi was getting ready for bed at approximately 11:10pm on 09\10\11 when i looked out my bedroom window and saw a bright yellow-orange orb pulsating and flashing. this orb was roughly 500ft from tree line and hovered for approximately 4 seconds and then took off at roughly 1000mph in straight horizontal line. in my opinion it is possible that this was a probe possibly from a mother-ship; this is only a conclusion. my feelings when seeing this object was shock, excitement and relief (because this notion from the mayan's indicating that 2012 et visitation on 12\21\12 maybe correct).
trends: There has been one other sighting in Millbury
There were no other sightings in Millbury on or around September 10th 2011
